question: Dua for Rizq
answer:
QUESTION

I wanted to ask  if it is ok to use the same towel around my  head n body after my husband has used it to wrap himself after a bath i.e the towel touches his private parts as well.

secondly i would like to ask is there any dua or tasbeeh to pray for rizk.i mean my husband lost his job n is at home since the past 6 months and is really very worried i have been praying a tasbeeh that u pray for 12 days 1200 times after isha prayer .can u give me any tasbeeh or dua to pray so dat my husband gets a job soon .
jazakallah

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh.

1. In principal, it is permissible for a wife to use the towel used by her husband if there are no impurities on the towel. The Jurists have advised that one should first wipe the upper part of the body before the lower part of the body. The wisdom behind this is the upper part of the body is free from impurities and the towel will be clean. Impurities are towards the lower part of the body. It is possible that the towel be soiled with the impurities before wiping the remaining body. With the same analogy, it is advisable not to use the towel used by ones husband to wrap his lower body.

2. Recite the following dua after each fardh salah:

الَّهُمَّ اكفِنَا بِحَلالِكَ عَن حَرَامِكَ وَ اَغنِنَا بِفَضلِكَ عَمَّن سِوَاك

Allahumma Akfinaa Bihalaalika `An Haramika Wa Aghninaa Bifadhlika `Am-man Siwaak

Oh Allah, Suffice us with (all that is) Halaal from you (and save us) from (all that is) Haram from you and make us independent by your virtue from anyone besides you

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
